subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Unorthodox variant {{Han simp|敘|f=攴|t=又|nocap=y}} found in the Tang dynasty orthographic dictionary {{w|Ganlu Zishu}} ({{w2|zh|干祿字書}}) and eventually adopted as an official form by the People's Republic of China. <!-- Note: Exact time period is unknown. Not found in 1956 《漢字簡化方案》 or 1964 《簡化字總表》 -->
